The dark totem top is an item obtained from monsters found within the Catacombs of Kourend (excluding ghosts). All Superior slayer monsters encountered in the Catacombs are guaranteed to drop a dark totem piece.

This item can be combined with the dark totem base and the dark totem middle to create the dark totem, which is used to reach Skotizo, a demon that lurks beneath the Catacombs.

  • 4 Trivia

  • 1 × Dark totem base

Item sources[edit | edit source]

The drop rate of a dark totem piece (excluding superior slayer monsters and Skotizo) is determined by the amount of hitpoints the monster has.

The exact formula is 1 500 − h i t p o i n t s {\displaystyle {\frac {1}{500-hitpoints}}}

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 March 2019
(update | poll)

Dark totem pieces no longer need to be assembled in order to continue receiving them.

30 June 2016
(update)

The item's value was increased from 10 to 205.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Previously, the High Level Alchemy value of a dark totem top was 6. This was changed in sometime in late 2016 to 123 so that it would appear above less valuable items when on the ground.

[[File:Dark totem top detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''dark totem top''' is an [[Items|item]] obtained from [[monsters]] found within the [[Catacombs of Kourend]] (excluding [[ghost]]s). All [[Superior slayer monster]]s encountered in the Catacombs are guaranteed to drop a dark totem piece.

This item can be combined with the [[dark totem base]] and the [[dark totem middle]] to create the [[dark totem]], which is used to reach [[Skotizo]], a demon that lurks beneath the Catacombs.
==Products==
{{Uses material list|Dark totem top}}
==Item sources==
The drop rate of a dark totem piece (excluding superior slayer monsters and Skotizo) is determined by the amount of [[hitpoints]] the monster has. 

The exact formula is <math>\frac{1}{500-hitpoints}</math>
{{Drop sources|Dark totem top}}
==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 7 March 2019
|update = QoL and W45 Changes
|poll = Quality of Life - Miscellaneous 2019
|change = Dark totem pieces no longer need to be assembled in order to continue receiving them.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 30 June 2016
|update = Item Incinerator
|change = The item's value was increased from 10 to 205.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*Previously, the [[High Level Alchemy]] value of a dark totem top was 6. This was changed in sometime in late 2016 to 123 so that it would appear above less valuable items when on the ground.

{{Catacombs of Kourend}}
